CustomField.description: This field is used to identify the quotelines/options which needs to be excluded from the Pricing Calculation by making the NetPrice/Nettotal as 0. But the Customer Price value will reflect in the Order form.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to identify the quotelines/options which needs to be excluded from the Pricing Calculation by making the NetPrice/Nettotal as 0. But the Customer Price value will reflect in the Order form.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Net Total
